sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-container>
      <!-- Top Bar -->
      <v-app-bar app color="blue darken-2" dark>
        <!-- Burger menu icon -->
        <v-btn icon @click="drawer = !drawer">
          <v-icon>mdi-menu</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
        <!-- Title -->
        <v-toolbar-title>{{ userName }}</v-toolbar-title>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <!-- Logout button -->
        <v-btn icon @click="logout">
          <v-icon>mdi-logout</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
      </v-app-bar>

      <!-- Sidebar -->
      <v-navigation-drawer app v-model="drawer" color="blue darken-2" dark>
        <v-list dense>
          <v-list-item
            v-for="(item, index) in sidebarItems"
            :key="index"
            @click="navigate(index)"
          >
            <v-list-item-action>
              <v-icon>{{ item.icon }}</v-icon>
            </v-list-item-action>
            <v-list-item-content>
              <v-list-item-title>{{ item.title }}</v-list-item-title>
            </v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-navigation-drawer>

      <!-- Main Content -->
      <v-main>
        <v-col cols="12" style="max-width: 1000px; margin: 0 auto">
          <v-card class="mx-auto" max-width="800">
            <v-card-title class="blue darken-2 white--text">
              Upload PDF Files
            </v-card-title>
            <v-card-text>
              <v-form ref="fileForm">
                <!-- File inputs for each type of file -->
                <v-file-input
                  v-model="solicitudResidencias"
                  label="Solicitud de residencias profesionales"
                  accept="application/pdf"
                  outlined
                ></v-file-input>
                <v-file-input
                  v-model="cartaPresentacion"
                  label="Carta de presentación"
                  accept="application/pdf"
                  outlined
                ></v-file-input>
                <v-file-input
                  v-model="cartaAceptacion"
                  label="Carta de aceptación"
                  accept="application/pdf"
                  outlined
                ></v-file-input>
                <v-file-input
                  v-model="cartillaIMSS"
                  label="Cartilla IMSS"
                  accept="application/pdf"
                  outlined
                ></v-file-input>
                <v-file-input
                  v-model="oficioAsignacion"
                  label="Oficio de Asignación de asesor interno"
                  accept="application/pdf"
                  outlined
                ></v-file-input>
                <v-file-input
                  v-model="anteproyecto"
                  label="Anteproyecto"
                  accept="application/pdf"
                  outlined
                ></v-file-input>
                <v-file-input
                  v-model="liberacionCreditos"
                  label="Liberación de los 5 créditos"
                  accept="application/pdf"
                  outlined
                ></v-file-input>
                <v-file-input
                  v-model="liberacionServicioSocial"
                  label="Liberación servicio social"
                  accept="application/pdf"
                  outlined
                ></v-file-input>
              </v-form>
            </v-card-text>
            <v-divider class="my-4"></v-divider>
            <v-card-actions>
              <v-btn color="blue darken-2" @click="submitForm">Submit</v-btn>
              <v-btn color="primary" @click="downloadAllFiles"
                >Download All Files</v-btn
              >
            </v-card-actions>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
      </v-main>
    </v-container>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      userName: localStorage.getItem("userName"),
      drawer: false,
      sidebarItems: [
        { title: "Proyecto", icon: "mdi-folder-outline" },
        { title: "Asesorias", icon: "mdi-account-plus-outline" },
        { title: "Archivos", icon: "mdi-file-document-outline" },
      ],
      solicitudResidencias: null,
      cartaPresentacion: null,
      cartaAceptacion: null,
      cartillaIMSS: null,
      oficioAsignacion: null,
      anteproyecto: null,
      liberacionCreditos: null,
      liberacionServicioSocial: null,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    navigate(index) {
      switch (index) {
        case 0:
          this.$router.push("/student");
          break;
        case 1:
          this.$router.push("/student/asesorias");
          break;
        case 2:
          this.$router.push("/student/archivos");
          break;
        default:
          break;
      }
    },
    logout() {
      localStorage.removeItem("token");
      localStorage.removeItem("user");
      this.$router.push("/login");
    },
    submitForm() {
      const formData = new FormData();
      // Append each file to the FormData object
      formData.append("solicitudResidencias", this.solicitudResidencias);
      formData.append("cartaPresentacion", this.cartaPresentacion);
      formData.append("cartaAceptacion", this.cartaAceptacion);
      formData.append("cartillaIMSS", this.cartillaIMSS);
      formData.append("oficioAsignacion", this.oficioAsignacion);
      formData.append("anteproyecto", this.anteproyecto);
      formData.append("liberacionCreditos", this.liberacionCreditos);
      formData.append(
        "liberacionServicioSocial",
        this.liberacionServicioSocial
      );

      // Submit the form data to the server
      // You'll need to implement the server route to handle this data
      // Use axios or any other HTTP client library to make the request
      // Example using axios:
      axios
        .post("http://localhost:3000/upload-multiple-files", formData)
        .then((response) => {
          console.log("Files uploaded:", response.data);
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          console.error("Error uploading files:", error);
        });
    },
    downloadAllFiles() {
      // Implement logic to download all files
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-btn i {
  color: white;
}
</style>
